message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $13,000. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $13,000 is a bit higher than I was hoping to spend. Would you be willing to go down to $11,000?
Bob, I appreciate you're willing to negotiate.  $11,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This would be a good price for both of us.
